content.text:
# 1950 Dominican Republic census__disambig_1

The Third National Census of Population of the Dominican Republic was raised on 6 August 1950, during the presidency of Rafael Le√≥nidas Trujillo, after the Decree No.6091 of 20 October 1949. 
This census collected information on sex, occupation, age, fertility, race, religion, marital status, nationality, literacy, ability to vote, and housing.
